docs.snippet: The ship McDougall, Capt. Davis, brought to this port yesterday from the Barbadoes Capt. Young of the wrecked bark Lizzie Perry, which went ashore while making for the Barbadoes in a leaking condition. The Lizzie Perry is the bark which picked up,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The ship McDougall, Capt. Davis, brought to this port yesterday from the Barbadoes Capt. Young of the wrecked bark Lizzie Perry, which went ashore while making for the Barbadoes in a leaking condition. The Lizzie Perry is the bark which picked up, on Nov. 20, Oscar Linn and Harry Magnus, the only survivors of the ship Alfred Watts.

headline.main: THIRTY-ONE DAYS IN PERIL.; TRYING EXPERIENCES OF SHIPWRECKED SAILORS.

docs.snippet: The steam-ship Devon, which arrived from Bristol on Wednesday evening, met with very bad weather on the 20th, while east of the banks. At 2 A.M. the wind went round from south to northeast, and increased in violence, until it was blowing a perfect...
docs.lead_paragraph: The steam-ship Devon, which arrived from Bristol on Wednesday evening, met with very bad weather on the 20th, while east of the banks. At 2 A.M. the wind went round from south to northeast, and increased in violence, until it was blowing a perfect hurricane.

headline.main: DISASTERS AT SEA.; A BRIG ABANDONED AND THE CREW SAVED ANOTHER WRECK MET WITH.
ROBBING A WRECKED VESSEL.; THE CARGO OF THE STEAM-SHIP BURGOS BOLDLY STOLEN--A PORTION RECOVERED.

docs.snippet: HALIFAX, Nova Scotia, July 20. The Government steamer Glendon arrived here at 9 o'clock to night from Sable Island, with 79 persons from the wrecked steamer State of Virginia, being all the passengers on board of her, and the firemen. The Glendon ...
docs.lead_paragraph: HALIFAX, Nova Scotia, July 20. The Government steamer Glendon arrived here at 9 o'clock to night from Sable Island, with 79 persons from the wrecked steamer State of Virginia, being all the passengers on board of her, and the firemen. The Glendon reached Sable Island at 3 o'clock yesterday afternoon, and in five hours took all on board and started for Halifax. The vessel was much corwded,...
